name: Yield
description: Earn rewards by depositing your crypto into a protocol.

name: Bridge
description: Transfer assets between different blockchain networks seamlessly.

name: CEXes
description: Centralized cryptocurrency exchanges that facilitate trading between users.

name: DEXes
description: Trade cryptocurrencies directly with others without intermediaries.

name: Trading
description: Trade cryptocurrencies directly with others without intermediaries.

name: NFTs
description: Unique digital assets that represent ownership of a specific item or piece of content.

name: Gaming
description: Integration of blockchain technology into video games.

name: Prediction Markets
description: Platforms to bet on the outcome of future events.

name: Payments
description: Send and receive digital assets as a form of payment.

name: SoFi
description: SoFi is social finance, enabling users to view and copy each other's onchain actions.

name: RWA
description: Digital representation and financial tools for real world assets like real estate or commodities.

name: Wallets
description: Software applications or hardware devices to securely store and manage cryptocurrency assets.
